job_tasks.phrase: Assisting researchers and students to efficiently deploy scientific workloads on the various AI platforms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the researchers' and students' scientific goals and translate them into efficient deployments on AI platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: work with researchers to understand and optimize their application
job_tasks.justification: This directly reflects the need to comprehend the users' application requirements and business context to provide optimization.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimizing application workflows and pipelines (training/inferencing, pre-processing, simulation, post-processing, data storage, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This involves the design and optimization of data processing steps within application workflows and pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: efficiently deploy scientific workloads on the various AI platforms
job_tasks.justification: The deployment of workloads implies working with and optimizing the underlying models or scientific computations.
Benchmarking and code optimization are direct activities related to understanding and improving the performance of models or applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Assisting researchers and students to efficiently deploy scientific workloads on the various AI platforms
job_tasks.justification: Deploying workloads involves integrating and managing software on different platforms, which is a software development aspect.
This involves tailoring and improving the execution of applications and their associated pipelines, a form of software engineering.
Directly refers to improving the efficiency and performance of code, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy scientific workloads on the various AI platforms
job_tasks.justification: The deployment and management of scientific workloads on AI platforms fall under operational engineering aspects.
Benchmarking and administration are operational tasks involved in managing and monitoring deployed systems.
Providing training and communication for end-users on how to use the deployed systems is an operational support function.

soft_skills.phrase: rise above yourself, in your profession, and as a person? Do you want to be challenged every day?
closely work with researchers, students of all departments, and TU/e institutes as well as with industry partners.
help us shape the future of our university, scientists, and students.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on supporting users in deploying and optimizing existing scientific workloads on AI platforms, rather than developing new AI models or GenAI applications. While AI platforms are mentioned, the core tasks align more with operational support and application optimization than core ML or GenAI engineering.
